persona.name: Dr Hargrave Quennington Beauregard IV
persona.public_role: Professor at Columbia, hosts 'Mystery, Mayhem & Mint Juleps' on PBS.
persona.secret_or_twist: May have no magic at all—just wit and charm.

persona.name: Jordan Lumberpond
persona.archetype: Indie folk icon turned Grammy-winning pop star
persona.public_role: Known for soulful ballads, protest anthems, silence during 2024 Brand Wars.
persona.invitation_reason: Lyrics influence millions—CC wants to license that influence.

persona.name: Ingrid Tienfjorg
persona.archetype: Global activist, Nobel laureate, enemy of corporate greenwashing
persona.public_role: Founder of WorldHarmony, cross-planar social justice coalition.
persona.invitation_reason: Her moral clarity could ruin or legitimize CC’s plans.
persona.secret_or_twist: Believes in redemption… even for CC.

persona.name: Vaultsy
persona.public_role: Allegedly a myth, but viral videos are real. Latest stunt: vanishing the Statue of Liberty’s torch.
persona.invitation_reason: Art destabilizes narrative—and Vaultsy’s black-market mystique undermines the aesthetics of consumer control.
persona.secret_or_twist: Secretly a group? An AI? Next heist: Wikipedia.

persona.name: Winifred Goopington
persona.archetype: Wellness mogul, spiritual grifter, mystic celeb
persona.public_role: Founder of Goop&Glow, selling enlightenment crystals to sentient probiotics.
persona.invitation_reason: Already sells narratives—CC wants to franchise her belief system.
persona.secret_or_twist: Might have achieved enlightenment… but mostly placebo.
